scripts.dev: npm --workspace backend run dev & npm --workspace frontend run dev
scripts.build: npm --workspace backend run build && npm --workspace frontend run build
scripts.lint: npm --workspace frontend run lint && npm --workspace backend run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm --workspace frontend run typecheck && npm --workspace backend run typecheck
scripts.test: npm --workspace frontend run test && npm --workspace backend run test
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
